snippet: The military has made videotapes of military medical officials force-feeding detainees on hunger strikes at the prison at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, according to a court filing on Tuesday.
abstract: Court filing reveals that the military has made videotapes of military medical officials force-feeding detainees on hunger strikes at the prison at Guantanamo Bay, Cuba.
lead_paragraph: The military has made videotapes of military medical officials force-feeding detainees on hunger strikes at the prison at Guantánamo Bay, Cuba, according to a court filing on Tuesday.

headline.main: Videos Said to Show Force-Feeding of Detainees at Guantánamo Bay
headline.print_headline: Videos Said to Show Force-Feeding of Detainees at Guantánamo Bay
